name: Closed Area / Wide Open Expanses
alternateName: Vandalized No Trespassing Sign — Desert Echo

citation.name: Relational Ontology Protocols: Building for Agents & Audiences

keywords: hidden in plain sight, semiotic decay, communication, trust, recursion, desert entropy, Las Vegas outskirts, vernacular signage, irony, order vs chaos
text: A boundary sign in an infinite landscape. Civilization asserts control; the desert answers with silence and time. Paint drips, letters fade—entropy takes authorship. The image frames a relationship more than a rule: order performed against a backdrop designed for erosion.

additionalProperty.name: symbolic_anchor
additionalProperty.value: civilization’s handwriting fading in the sun
